Let's see  the Matrix once opened could be closed again retaining it's
shape, however in essence what is seen on BM is easily the size of the
matrix of leadship: Remember BW/BM transformers are like one tenth the size
of an old transformer hence the matrix of leader ship would be the size of a
small structure to them rather than something you'd fit in your chest
cavity.

Yes cybertrons "moons" were like our own moon, made of rock. Cybertron
itself is a completely technological planet. If you watched the series at
all and seen the various shots of inside cybertron then compare the scales
you're realize that the "core" BM used is somewhere inside the structured
walls of the old cybertron. Case in point, they butchered the scale in BM
and butchered the knowledge with it.

----- Original Message -----
From: "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 06, 2002 4:24 PM
Subject: Re: G1
